description: 10-day Synthesis Land Surface Temperature (LST10-TCI) provides a statistical overview of the LST over each 10-day compositing for every image pixel. LST10-TCI is useful for the scientific community, namely for those dealing with meteorological and climate models. Accurate values of LST are also of special interest in a wide range of areas related to land surface processes, including meteorology, hydrology, agrometeorology, climatology and environmental studies.
title: Land Surface Temperature: global 10-daily Thermal Condition Index (raster 5km) - version 2, Jan 2021
